plugins.name: [NEW] Gleef - Translate and localize with AI
plugins.description:
Designed for teams to automate translation and streamline localization tasks directly in Figma.


Key Features

  1. Time-saving AI generation: Automate translation, key naming and searching, eliminating manual tasks and reduce the time spent on localization management.
  2. Workflow optimization: Maintain clarity and consistency by adhering to your project's naming conventions while preventing duplicate keys.
  3. Project organization: Easily track translated and pending keys to keep your localization projects on schedule.
  4. Code quality: Ensure formatting consistency across your localization files for polished and professional results.


How Gleef works

  1. Import your localization files: Quickly upload your existing localization files to get started.
  2. Select source language: Choose the source language for translations, typically the language used in your Figma designs.
  3. Choose screens / frames: Select one or multiple screens you're localizing within your Figma project.
  4. Adjust translations and keys: Maintain full control, adjust translations before exporting, allowing for fine-tuning of re-used and generated keys.
  5. Export ready files: Import the new keys into your preferred localization tool or copy-paste the updated locale file directly into your IDE.


Integrate Gleef into your Figma workflow, to significantly improve your localization process, save time and ensure consistency across your global product designs.


Whether you have questions, need a hand, or just want to share your feedback, don’t hesitate to give us a call – or send us a message if that’s more your style. We're excited to help you make the most of our new tool! +33 6 44 60 97 54

accepted.name: Gleef
accepted.description: Gleef optimizes word choice and facilitates the localization process with automatized localization, contextualized translations and brand-specific suggestion

plugins.tagline: Save time by translating with AI directly in your product workflow, for free.

plugins.name: Component Utility
plugins.description:
Component Utility

A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

Demo: https://youtu.be/j6dRKs2V8dQ


Clone Command

Clones the master component and links the selected instances to it.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked to new master component, along with the master component to be cloned.
  2. Run the clone command.
  3. A new master component would have been created and all the selected instances are linked to it.


Link Command

Links the selected instances to the designated master component. It can also links detached instances (or a frame containing similar child elements as the master component) and the designated master component.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked, along with the master component to which they should be linked to.
  2. Run the link command.
plugins.tagline: A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

  2. Run the link command.
85242.release_notes: Added support for dynamic page loading.
85242.tagline: A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

plugins.name: LinguaSync
plugins.description:
LinguaSync is in Beta test for limted user.


Features

  1. Context-Aware Translation: By leveraging the strengths of the AI model, which excels at understanding context, this plugin can accurately translate specifications and service screens written in various languages including English, Japanese, Vietnamese, and Korean.
  2. One-Click Translation: To save you from the tedious process of copying and pasting text, we have implemented a feature that allows users to directly select the area within Figma for one-click translation.
  3. Replace Mode: The plugin is equipped with the ability to translate while retaining the existing Figma text format into the desired multilingual language. If you wish, you can simultaneously view the input and output languages without overwriting.
plugins.tagline: Unlock multilingual superpowers with our plugin, using AI to translate and understand context!

72618.tagline: Unlock multilingual superpowers with our plugin, using AI to translate and understand context!

plugins.name: Xerus
plugins.description:
Xerus helps you to organize the texts of your designs while having powerful tools to automate your text workflow. It synchronizes your figma text and your Airtable database.


Xerus is for free! I am glad I can contribute to the community. Airtable has a free version too, that supports a maximum of text entries, please check their price plan to see which option is best for you.


Getting started

There are several ways to use Xerus in your project. In this website, I explain you step by step how to set up Xerus for your project. Do you want to change the language of all text in your design? Do you want to update all instances of a text? Xerus can do it for you.


Features

  • Text synchronization between Airtable database and Figma.
  • Multiple layer synchronization pointing to the same database entry.
  • Single layer synchronization.
  • Multiple database connections


Incoming features

Do you have suggestions to improve Xerus? Contact me!

  • Import/Export of PO files.
  • Support complex Airtable fields


Updates

  • 1.0: first release
  • 2.0: fixed bug with airtable token and improved the error messaging.
  • 3.0: added support texts with breaklines
plugins.tagline: Xerus allows you to manage large amount of texts in your designs.

plugins.name: ASCII Art Generator
plugins.description:
Bring old-school, retro ASCII magic straight into Figma with the ASCII Art Generator plugin! Turn any image—portraits, logos, icons—into radiant text-based artwork inspired by classic terminal visuals.


  1. Subscription via plugin or one-time payment license
  2. Get one-time-payment lifetime license here ->


Key Features

Live Image Import

Upload any image (JPG/PNG) or paste a URL and instantly see it in ASCII form.


Full Adjustment Controls

• Brightness, Contrast & Blur sliders

• Invert toggle for negative‐style art


Rich Dithering Options

• Floyd–Steinberg, Atkinson, Ordered Bayer & Noise dithering

• Toggle “Ignore White” to preserve whitespace


Multiple Character Sets

• Standard (@%#*+=-:.)

• Block (█▓▒░)

• Binary (0/1), Hex (0–F)

• Custom “Manual” character

• Ultra-detailed glyph palette


Edge-Detection Modes

• Sobel outline for high-contrast edges

• Difference-of-Gaussians “DOG” contour style


Flexible Output Formats (Pro)

• Editable text node in Figma (pro)

• PNG export

• SVG code insert (pro) Vector outline (path-based)


Seamless Insertion

One-click “Insert” drops your ASCII art into the canvas, centered and ready to tweak.


Copy & Share

Copy pure ASCII text to clipboard or export vector/SVG code for use elsewhere.


Free Trial & License

• 2 free insertions under trial (PNG)

• Easy upgrade flow via in-plugin “Upgrade” (current user) or “Activate License” (1 or multiple one-time-payment) buttons

• Usage counter and “mouse-follower” overlay when trial ends

accepted.name: Eugenio Ciccale
accepted.description:
I'm a Product Designer & Front-end developer creating Figma Plugins to enhance your creative workflows

https://shop.plusuidesign.com/

plugins.tagline: Convert images into ASCII art in Figma with brightness, contrast, dithering, and vector export

plugins.name: Sitemap Builder
plugins.description:
Designed to automate sitemap numbering and rename multiple frames in one click, saving time and keeping your frames organized.


- Create sitemaps quickly by manually inputting or importing one from a text layer in Figma

- Generate a sitemap with hierarchical numbering and export it to Figma

- Custom numbering available in settings

- Add more levels to your sitemap as needed

- Select sitemap page names to apply names to Figma frames

- Improves workflow efficiency and reduces documentation effort
plugins.tagline: Your sitemap, your structure—automated.

plugins.name: TypeGrid
plugins.description:
TypeGrid allows you to:

  1. Generate a typescale: Choose your base font size, ratio, and number of steps, and the plugin instantly creates a preview of your typescale.
  2. Apply a baseline grid: Set your baseline unit and rounding mode, and the plugin ensures your text layers align perfectly to the grid.
  3. Create text layers: With a single click, generate text layers for each step in your typescale, automatically named and styled.
  4. Create text styles: Generate Figma text styles for each step in your typescale, making it easy to apply consistent typography throughout your design.
  5. Preview with custom fonts: See how your typescale looks with any font installed on your system, including different weights.
  6. Fine-tune your settings: Adjust your typescale and baseline grid settings in real-time to get the perfect look for your design.
  7. Save time and ensure consistency: Automate the tedious process of creating and managing typescales and baseline grids, saving you time and ensuring consistency across your designs.
plugins.tagline: Streamline typography with typescale previews, text styles, and a consistent baseline grid.

138043.name: TypeGrid
138043.description:
TypeGrid allows you to:

  1. Generate a typescale: Choose your base font size, ratio, and number of steps, and the plugin instantly creates a preview of your typescale.
  2. Apply a baseline grid: Set your baseline unit and rounding mode, and the plugin ensures your text layers align perfectly to the grid.
  3. Create text layers: With a single click, generate text layers for each step in your typescale, automatically named and styled.
  4. Create text styles: Generate Figma text styles for each step in your typescale, making it easy to apply consistent typography throughout your design.
  5. Preview with custom fonts: See how your typescale looks with any font installed on your system, including different weights.
  6. Fine-tune your settings: Adjust your typescale and baseline grid settings in real-time to get the perfect look for your design.
  7. Save time and ensure consistency: Automate the tedious process of creating and managing typescales and baseline grids, saving you time and ensuring consistency across your designs.
138043.release_notes:
- Line heights now adjust automatically based on font size.
- Small text (16px or less) gets extra spacing for readability.
- Medium and large text gets gradually tighter line heights.
- Big headings (32px+) have tight, bold spacing for better visual impact.
- All sizes now look more balanced and easier to read.
138043.tagline: Streamline typography with typescale previews, text styles, and a consistent baseline grid.

plugins.name: Designer Starter Kit
plugins.description:
Start your design projects with a consistent structure. This plugin helps new designers build out essential project pages quickly and efficiently, ensuring uniformity across files. Customize page names, order, and background colors, and even save up to five configurations for future projects.


—


How to Use?

  1. Input the desired names for each page.
  2. Add, remove or reorganize pages as needed.
  3. Save your setup as a configuration for later use or stick with the default.


*Included a basic structure for Design Systems & Design Research


—


Made with ❤️ in México using Cursor AI and Claude 3.5. Feedback is appreciated —thank you!
plugins.tagline: A starter kit structure to build fast with consistency

plugins.name: Caravage
plugins.description:
Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


About

Caravage allows you to check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


You can either select individually any text layer or scan a selection and the plugin will automatically give you for each text:

  1. The colour(s) of the text.
  2. The colour(s) of the background directly behind the text.
  3. The font size and weight of the text.
  4. The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).
  5. The minimum contrast value provided by the APCA contrast look up table.


Credits

  1. This plugin was inspired by another plugin called Contrast.
  2. This plugin use the Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm by Andrew Somers.
  3. This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.
  4. This plugin use Figma Plugin DS, a lightweight UI library.
plugins.tagline: Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

117095.name: Caravage
117095.description:
Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


About

  2. The colour(s) of the background directly behind the text.
  3. The font size and weight of the text.
  4. The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).
  5. The minimum contrast value provided by the APCA contrast look up table.


Credits

  1. This plugin was inspired by another plugin called Contrast.
  2. This plugin use the Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm by Andrew Somers.
  3. This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.
  4. This plugin use Figma Plugin DS, a lightweight UI library.
117095.release_notes: Fix issue with the scan feature where nodes were not selectable.
117095.tagline: Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

plugins.name: Dynogee Image Rendering API
plugins.description:
Dynogee is an easy and quick tool to expose your Figma designs as an API:


  1. ✨ Swap text and images with dynamic content
  2. 📐 Create pixel perfect copies of your design
  3. 🏎️ Supa-fast rendering times, render images on-the-fly
  4. 🚀 We thought of it: custom fonts, truncation, i18n, you name it


It’s like Figma's Export feature, but as an API. 💫


How to use the plugin


  1. Select a frame in Figma, and open the plugin
  2. Define layers for which you want to provide content via the API
  3. Create your template 🚀


Pro tip: Set a max height on text layers to enforce truncation. ✂️


Features


Full creative freedom

Use your brand fonts, colors and more to create high-fidelity dynamic images ✨


Fast rendering

Our backend is optimized to generate and distribute your images without long wait times. Often images are generated in as little as 200ms.


Handoff your templates to developers

Each template your create comes with it's own documentation and playground environment, making it trivial for your engineering team to make use of the image rendering API.


Contact


If you want to share your feedback, please reach out to us at support@dynogee.com.
plugins.tagline: Turn your Figma frames into an image rendering API

124922.name: Dynogee Image Rendering API
124922.description:
Dynogee is an easy and quick tool to expose your Figma designs as an API:


  1. ✨ Swap text and images with dynamic content
  2. 📐 Create pixel perfect copies of your design
  3. 🏎️ Supa-fast rendering times, render images on-the-fly
  4. 🚀 We thought of it: custom fonts, truncation, i18n, you name it


It’s like Figma's Export feature, but as an API. 💫


How to use the plugin


  1. Select a frame in Figma, and open the plugin
  2. Define layers for which you want to provide content via the API
  3. Create your template 🚀

Features

124922.tagline: Turn your Figma frames into an image rendering API

plugins.name: Quick Roblox UI Exporter by Solys
plugins.description:
How it Works:

  1. Name the files inside Figma you want to export as one of the keywords: 'Frame' , 'Button', 'Icon', etc
  2. Preferably use a 1920x1080 background behind your UI, for example have the settings frame UI on a 1920x1080 background, group it together and name it 'Settings'
  3. The plugin will export and auto organize, you'll receive a file with Settings screen inside, an import reference for the Settings screen and all assets needed inside. Saving you hours on big projects as you can select 20, 30 screens at once and click export!


Why You’ll Love It:


⚡ One-Click Export – Select the UI screens you want to export and click the button


📁 Neatly Organized – Auto-sorts files by screens for easy access, all stored nicely in a zipped folder


⏳ Saves Time – Focus on design, not file management & exporting


✅ Hassle-Free – Works seamlessly with any project, automatically detects UI it needs to export by it's name, if it contains following keywords in it's name the plugin will automatically export the UI as a PNG file:

Frame

Button

Icon

UI

Scroll

Line

Title

Subtitle

Captions don't matter just include the keyword into one of those UIs you made and it'll export it automatically, you also have it nicely named for easy work with importing.


🔍 Auto-Upscaled (3x) – Maintains perfect quality for Roblox imports.


📌 Import References – Each screen automatically gets an import image reference to guide the user for seamless Roblox importing.



🎯 Try it now & simplify your workflow!
plugins.tagline: Export & auto organize whole game UI projects in seconds

plugins.name: Dynamic QR code generator
plugins.description:
Create dynamic QR codes from right within Figma


Dynamic QR codes are editable and trackable so they are ideal for your marketing materials.

plugins.name: Ecco Icon
plugins.description:
What is Ecco Icon?

Ecco Icon is a free, ever-expanding icon pack featuring both static and animated icons. This plugin allows designers to seamlessly add static versions of the icons to their Figma designs. When it’s time for development, animated Lottie versions can be downloaded from Ecco Icon website to bring projects to life.

For more customization, designers can also download the After Effects (.aep) files from Ecco Icon website to tweak colors or use them in mockups.


Is it really free?

Yes, it is! No paywalls or registration required. All icons, including animated versions, are free to use under the Creative Commons BY 4.0 license.

Thanks to your generous donations, the project continues to grow with even more icons and features!


This icon pack is created and maintained with love by Sajjad Dashti—graphic designer, product designer, and motion designer. For any inquiries, feel free to contact me at hi@sajjaddashti.ir.
plugins.tagline: Ecco Icon is a free pack with static and animated icons. Use this plugin to add them to your design.

119328.name: Ecco Icon
119328.description:

When it’s time for development, animated Lottie versions can be downloaded from Ecco Icon website to bring projects to life.

For more customization, designers can also download the After Effects (.aep) files from Ecco Icon website to tweak colors or use them in mockups.


Is it really free?

Yes, it is! No paywalls or registration required. All icons, including animated versions, are free to use under the Creative Commons BY 4.0 license.

Thanks to your generous donations, the project continues to grow with even more icons and features!


This icon pack is created and maintained with love by Sajjad Dashti—graphic designer, product designer, and motion designer. For any inquiries, feel free to contact me at hi@sajjaddashti.ir.
119328.tagline: Ecco Icon is a free pack with static and animated icons. Use this plugin to add them to your design.

plugins.name: Merge Fills
plugins.description: Figma does not offer a built-in way to merge fills from multiple objects, or to easily append fills to an object. This plugin scratches that itch: You can select a number of objects, copy their fill styles, and apply the merged fill style to another object. This will also detach styles from their libraries in the process.
plugins.tagline: Merge Fills From Multiple Nodes Into One

84887.name: Merge Fills
84887.description: Figma does not offer a built-in way to merge fills from multiple objects, or to easily append fills to an object. This plugin scratches that itch: You can select a number of objects, copy their fill styles, and apply the merged fill style to another object. This will also detach styles from their libraries in the process.
84887.release_notes: Add menu commands for quick running
84887.tagline: Merge Fills From Multiple Nodes Into One

plugins.name: Pulpo
plugins.description:
Introducing the Pulpo Plugin for Figma, a powerful tool that seamlessly integrates your Figma files with Pulpo, providing you with a centralized platform to manage all your Figma comments.


With the Pulpo Plugin, you can effortlessly sync multiple Figma files, consolidating all the comments from each file into a single, unified space.


Gone are the days of juggling between different Figma projects to keep track of discussions and feedback. This plugin offers a streamlined workflow, allowing you to visualize and organize all your Figma comments in one convenient location. By bringing together comments from multiple files, you gain a comprehensive overview of the feedback received across your design projects.

Through its intuitive interface, the Pulpo Plugin empowers you to efficiently navigate through your comments, providing seamless access to the context and details of each conversation. You can easily respond to comments, resolve issues, or collaborate with your team members directly from within Pulpo.


With Pulpo's advanced features, you can also assign comments to specific team members, set due dates, and track the progress of discussions, ensuring that all feedback is addressed and actioned upon in a timely manner.


The Pulpo Plugin not only enhances your team's collaboration but also improves your overall design workflow. By centralizing your Figma comments, you can eliminate the need for constant switching between projects, saving you valuable time and effort.


Experience a new level of efficiency and organization with the Pulpo Plugin for Figma. Streamline your comment management process and unlock the full potential of your design collaboration.


For more info visit https://usepulpo.com/
plugins.tagline: All your Figma files comments in one place

plugins.name: Bento Peep
plugins.description:
Organize your work into a neat bento grid with the Bento Peep plugin.


Just select a frame with the content you want to arrange and run the plugin — that’s all.


How it works:

— Creates a new layout every time, with a natural, varied result

— Automatically adapts to your frame’s dimensions

— Offers a few settings to fine-tune the layout


Perfect for quick structure, visual rhythm, or giving your layout a fresh new feel.

Try it a few times — the results are always a little different.
plugins.tagline: Pack your stuff into a bento grid

plugins.name: Random values generator
plugins.description:
This plugin is created to help you save time and speed up productivity by allowing you generate random values with just a click.

You can quickly create numeric, alphanumeric, or pattern-based random values.

Whether you’re prototyping, testing input fields, or designing layouts, this plugin ensures precision and speed by generating values tailored to your needs.


How to use

  1. Run the Random Values generator plugin
  2. Select one or multiple text layers
  3. Select the type of values you want, enter your preferred number of character and click on ‘Generate values”
  4. The pattern-based values allow you to define the format in which random values are generated. For example, by using "X" for random alphabets and "#" for random numbers, you can control the structure of the output. Separators such as - (dash), . (dot), and _ (underscore) can also be included to customize the format further.

Example Patterns:

X#XX## could generate D3FR53.

##XX#X-XX## could generate 06CO2M-FC92.

This feature allows you to create structured, randomized values for placeholders, tokens, or testing data with ease.


Use cases:

  1. Populating Placeholder Data : Use the plugin to generate realistic placeholder values for prototypes, such as: Unique identifiers (e.g., serial numbers, order numbers, or product codes).
  2. Form fields like usernames, passwords, or verification codes
  3. Generate unique codes and simulate real world data: Generate pattern-based values to mimic specific real-world data, such as: License plates, invoice numbers, customer IDs, coupons, gift card, events tickets
  4. Testing UI scalability: Check how your designs handle varying lengths and types of values, ensuring components like input fields, labels, and tables remain responsive and visually consistent.


Need any help or have questions? Please reach out


Show me some support
plugins.tagline: Generate random values for your project

136533.name: Random values generator
136533.description:

plugins.name: Simple Pomodoro
plugins.description:
🍅 Simple Pomodoro: Your Design Sidekick 🎨

Hey there, productivity ninja! Ready to slice through your design tasks like a hot knife through butter? Say hello to Simple Pomodoro – your new secret weapon in the battle against procrastination and creative blocks.

This sleek, no-nonsense timer is here to supercharge your workflow:


  1. 25-minute focus sprints to keep you in the zone
  2. Clean, distraction-free interface that won't cramp your style


Whether you're crafting pixel-perfect icons or wrestling with complex layouts, Simple Pomodoro's got your back.

Crush deadlines, conquer creative challenges, and make burnout a thing of the past.


With Simple Pomodoro, you're not just designing, you're designing like a boss.

Ready to level up your Figma game? Hit that install button and let's get those creative juices flowing! 🚀✨

plugins.name: Design Pulse
plugins.description:
Automatically check and maintain design consistency across your Figma files. This plugin helps you ensure that all elements follow your design system guidelines.


Key Features:

• Color Styles - Ensure colors are linked to styles

• Typography - Check text styles consistency

• Effects - Validate shadow and blur styles

• Spacing - Check auto-layout spacing variables

• Storke - Verify stroke style usage

• Corner Radius - Validate radius consistency


How to use:

1. Select any frame in your design

2. Click "Run Checker"

3. Review the results

4. Click on any item to inspect and fix inconsistencies


Perfect for:

✓ Design System Managers

✓ UI/UX Designers

✓ Design QA

✓ Team Leads


The plugin provides real-time feedback and makes it easy to maintain design consistency across your projects.
plugins.tagline: Keep your design system's heartbeat strong

plugins.name: To the top
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin allows me to move any selected objects to the topmost level of Figma page hierarchy, preserving their absolute positions on the canvas. No more manual dragging, dropping, or adjusting coordinates. Ideal for managing complex nested designs and maintaining a tidy layer structure. Less scroll layers, more control where and how you paste stuff.


It enables two use cases:

  1. Move all selected to the top -> cut -> paste in place in any selected frame or group without moving anything.
  2. Free guides and arrows from being cropped by their parent frames, which is helpful when preparing references and when some modals with clipping=on involved.


Differences from similar plugins - this one support multiple objects, and, doesn't move anything anywhere regardless of whatever coordinates starting point😊
plugins.tagline: Move selected elements to the top level of page hierarchy

60986.name: To the top
60986.description:
This Figma plugin allows me to move any selected objects to the topmost level of Figma page hierarchy, preserving their absolute positions on the canvas. No more manual dragging, dropping, or adjusting coordinates. Ideal for managing complex nested designs and maintaining a tidy layer structure. Less scroll layers, more control where and how you paste stuff.


It enables two use cases:

  1. Move all selected to the top -> cut -> paste in place in any selected frame or group without moving anything.
  2. Free guides and arrows from being cropped by their parent frames, which is helpful when preparing references and when some modals with clipping=on involved.


Differences from similar plugins - this one support multiple objects, and, doesn't move anything anywhere regardless of whatever coordinates starting point😊
60986.tagline: Move selected elements to the top level of page hierarchy

plugins.name: QR Code Generator – Create Free Custom SVG QR Codes in Figma
plugins.description:
Generate sleek, customizable SVG QR codes in Figma! Free plugin with easy color, corner, and background adjustments. Perfect for professional designs.


🎨 Adjust colors,

🟪 Tweak corners,

💫 Fine-tune backgrounds,

🌈 Match your design style.



------------------------------------------------------



Plus UI QR Code Generator is a powerful and intuitive Figma Plugin designed to revolutionize the way designers create and implement QR Codes for Figma projects. Whether you need a Custom QR Code for a branding campaign, a digital product, or a marketing asset, this plugin provides everything you need, directly integrated into your favorite Design Tool.


With this Free Plugin, you can effortlessly generate SVG QR Codes, ensuring that every code you create is crisp, scalable, and ready for any digital or print application. The plugin offers a seamless Figma Customization experience, allowing you to adjust colors, shapes, and backgrounds to match your unique style. Create Colorful QR Codes that pop and attract attention, all while maintaining the integrity and professionalism of your design.


Plus UI QR Code Generator is ideal for designers working on projects that require advanced Branding elements. Whether you’re designing for a major marketing campaign, a sleek mobile app, or a company’s digital identity, this tool fits perfectly into any Design Workflow. Its smooth and intuitive interface allows for quick creation of professional QR codes, making it a must-have in any Digital Design toolkit.


One of the standout features of this Figma Plugin is its adaptability to complex Design Systems. If you’re managing a large-scale design project with multiple assets and components, you’ll appreciate how easily Plus UI QR Code Generator integrates with your existing system, helping you maintain visual consistency across platforms.


From enhancing User Interface designs with embedded QR codes to creating dynamic links for marketing materials, this plugin offers an effortless way to generate professional codes that align with your project’s aesthetic and functionality. Whether you’re crafting a digital business card, an event invitation, or a product tag, Plus UI QR Code Generator empowers you to create versatile, brand-consistent solutions.


In today’s fast-paced design landscape, efficiency and creativity are essential. This plugin streamlines the process of incorporating QR Codes for Figma, freeing you to focus on what you do best – designing beautiful and functional experiences. Say goodbye to generic QR codes and hello to stunning, customized solutions with Plus UI QR Code Generator.

107916.description: Managing design tokens and variables across large design systems is becoming increasingly complex. Designers struggle to visualize relationships between variables, track dependencies, and maintain consistency across projects. -> 🍉🍉🍉
107916.tagline: Transform your Figma variables into interactive flowcharts instantly

plugins.name: Infa
plugins.description:
What is Infa

Manage your design system inventory directly within your product's webpage. Learn more at https://infa.ai/


What does the Figma Plugin for Figma unlock?

Pull all the screenshots and code snippets for your component views from Infa into FigJam. This enhances your design system review sessions by enabling visual and code comparisons of components. Navigate back to the component in your real product through our Chrome extension, ensuring that your design critiques are grounded in actual product usage.


How to Get Started:

  1. Install the Chrome Extension: Create components and select them within the Chrome Extension:https://infa.ai/chrome-extension
  2. Upgrade to Pro: Upgrade your account to Pro and upload your board to the cloud to connect your Figma plugin.
  3. Take Screenshots and Capture Code: Open component views in the Chrome Extension and click on "Take Screenshot" or "Capture Code" to make them available in your plugin.
  4. Authenticate: Open the Figma plugin and enter your API key from your Info account to authenticate. https://infa.ai/profile#api
  5. Import Components: Select the components to import screenshots and code into FigJam.


Contact Us:

For any questions or recommendations, please reach out to us at contact@infa.ai
plugins.tagline: New way of Conducting Design System Inventory and Visualizing Design System in use with Infa

plugins.name: Multi-Color Contrast Checker
plugins.description: This plugin will run a contrast test comparing each color style in your file against every other color style. You will get a comprehensive list of all passes, fails, color-multiple passes, as well as a adjustment suggestions for colors that nearly passed.
plugins.tagline: Quickly test all color styles for web accessibility contrast levels

108039.name: Multi-Color Contrast Checker
108039.description: This plugin will run a contrast test comparing each color style in your file against every other color style. You will get a comprehensive list of all passes, fails, color-multiple passes, as well as a adjustment suggestions for colors that nearly passed.
108039.release_notes: Now suggests possible changes in the amount of lightness/darkness for colors that fail to attempt to make your palettes more accessible overall.
108039.tagline: Quickly test all color styles for web accessibility contrast levels

plugins.name: pmcopilot.ai - Diagram Exporter
plugins.description: Expand your capabilities by exporting Figma diagrams to your Product Management copilot. You can quickly draw workflows, processes and new functionalities, export the diagram to pmcopilot.ai and translate them into Functional Requirements, User Stories and Epics.
plugins.tagline: Export your FigJam diagrams to pmcopilot.ai

62386.name: pmcopilot.ai - Diagram Exporter
62386.description: Expand your capabilities by exporting Figma diagrams to your Product Management copilot. You can quickly draw workflows, processes and new functionalities, export the diagram to pmcopilot.ai and translate them into Functional Requirements, User Stories and Epics.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin sends extracted FigJam diagram information to pmcopilot.ai platform for further processing.

62386.tagline: Export your FigJam diagrams to pmcopilot.ai

plugins.name: Iconeer
plugins.description:
Iconeer is your Figma plugin for ensuring pixel-perfect icons in every design.


With customizable checks for icon size, stroke weight, color consistency, and more, Iconeer helps you maintain clean, accessible, and consistent icons across projects. From color style validation to customizable rules for padding, naming conventions, and hidden layers, Iconeer gives you full control to streamline your icon quality and design workflow.
plugins.tagline: Your Icon Checkmate

106829.name: Iconeer
106829.description:
Iconeer is your Figma plugin for ensuring pixel-perfect icons in every design.


With customizable checks for icon size, stroke weight, color consistency, and more, Iconeer helps you maintain clean, accessible, and consistent icons across projects. From color style validation to customizable rules for padding, naming conventions, and hidden layers, Iconeer gives you full control to streamline your icon quality and design workflow.
106829.release_notes:
- Fixed sizing bugs
- Fixed font bugs
- Dynamic Page loading feature has been added to manifest

plugins.name: Subtitle Generator
plugins.description:
Text to Frames generates individual frames with each word from your script or sentence.

Steps:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Paste your script into the text field
  3. Click Create

That's it! Now watch your frames get generated instantly.


This is helpful for those whose content is full based on subtitles and does not use a face cam.
plugins.tagline: Paste your script and generate subtitles for each word, especially if you are content creator.
